document.heading: COMPREHENSIVE MERIT PERSONNEL ACT OF 1978 OPERATION DESERT SHIELD AND DESERT STORM ACTIVE DUTY PAY DIFFERENTIAL AMENDMENT ACT OF 1991, BILL 9-149

history.narrative: Law 9-12 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-149, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 9, 1991, and May 7, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 17, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-30 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
